title: Modern Family Doctor Plans to Open 4-5 Speciality Diabetes Clinic in Bangalore in Six Months
text: Wednesday, September 9, 2015 12:47PM IST (7:17AM GMT) Modern Family Doctor Plans to Open 4-5 Speciality Diabetes Clinic in Bangalore in Six Months Bangalore, Karnataka, India Modern Family Doctor set up its first Speciality Diabetes Clinic in Bangalore to provide ongoing comprehensive care to diabetics. The Speciality Diabetes Clinic has a dedicated Diabetic Foot Clinic, Diabetic Retinopathy Screening and Anodyne Therapy for Diabetic Foot. The clinic is staffed with an experienced Diabetologist, Podiatrist, Diabetes Counsellor, Nutritionist, Foot Care Specialists and Eye Care Specialists. The Diabetic Foot Clinic is run in association with the Jain Institute of Vascular Sciences and the Diabetic Eye Clinic in association with Narayana Nethralaya. Modern Family Doctor plans to roll out 4-5 more clinics across Bangalore in the next 6 months to help diabetics manage this lifestyle disorder in the comfort of their neighbourhood. “With the diabetic population increasing rapidly, the need for continuous management of the disease in the neighbourhood has become imperative. We plan to take these clinics across India to spread awareness among diabetics about their feet and eyes.” said Naresh Malhotra, CEO of Modern Family Doctor. The company has raised an initial round of funding from Saama and Bamboo and are in the process of raising additional funding to fund expansion. About Modern Family Doctor: Modern Family Doctor Pvt Ltd is an Indian private health care provider making health care affordable and available to everyone. “thefamily doc+or” and “the family pharma” are located in high street, gated residential communities and corporate campuses, providing a one stop healthcare clinic to meet a family's primary ailments and diagnostic needs. All “the family doc+or” units provide well qualified and experienced General Practitioners and Specialists in Gynecology, Pediatrics, Dermatology, Orthopedics, ENT, Physiotherapy and Psychology. All diagnostic laboratory tests and minor procedures are available at “the family doc+or” clinics.
